title: Audit the Corporate Travel Program
description: An operational auditor reviews the corporate travel program to identify cost-saving opportunities.

tasks.description: Analyze travel data to determine the company's top travel routes and hotel chains.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies the top 10 most frequent city pairs and hotel brands.

tasks.description: Review the company's current contracts with airlines and hotels.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that the company does not have negotiated corporate rates with its most-used airline.

tasks.description: Recommend that the procurement department enter into negotiations with the top airline and hotel chain to secure discounted corporate rates.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific, data-driven recommendation for cost savings is made.
